author: Special Correspondent
text:
A guard at the Juvenile Home in Kellys fell from the second floor of the building during the early hours of Thursday.

According to police, Anandraj, an armed reserve constable from Arakonnam, was on duty at the juvenile home. He was patrolling on the second floor around 1 a.m., when he allegedly slipped and fell. The other guards rushed him to a hospital and he has reportedly damaged his hips.
title: Guard injured
